fields.name: txtUnknownCompetitor
fields.fieldText: If the competitor is unknown, add the "Unknown" competitor.

fields.name: inpLostReason
fields.helpText: Select competitor or incumbent if applicable. Otherwise, wnter the primary reason.

fields.name: txtErrorIsIncumbentAndLostTo
fields.fieldText: {!fxAddOrEdit} at least one competitor as Is Incumbent and Lost To.

fields.name: txtErrorLostTo
fields.fieldText: {!fxAddOrEdit} at least one competitor as Lost To.

fields.name: txtAddOrEditCompetitors
fields.fieldText: Add or edit competitors by double clicking the below fields.

fields.name: txtErrorIsIncumbentAndLostToError
fields.fieldText: To save, {!fxAddOrEditLowercase} at least one competitor as Is Incumbent and Lost To.

fields.name: txtErrorLostToError
fields.fieldText: To save, {!fxAddOrEditLowercase} at least one competitor as Lost To.

fields.name: txtError
fields.fieldText:
Uh oh


Something went wrong.


Reach out in #help-sales-ops and reference this error message:


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}
